articles.title: Red Sox will keep Roman Anthony in leadoff spot for 2026 season. What could rest of lineup look like?
articles.description:
Anthony served as the Red Sox' leadoff hitter for the majority of the final month of his rookie season.

The post Red Sox will keep Roman Anthony in leadoff spot for 2026 season. What could rest of lineup look like? appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Red Sox confirm Roman Anthony as leadoff hitter for the 2026 season.
Anthony led off for most of September during his rookie year.
Boston fans can expect a consistent batting strategy moving forward.

articles.title: Margo Price talks AI, bro-country and meeting Joan Baez at the circus
articles.description:
Ahead of her Boston show, the Grammy nominee discusses her inspirations — and reveals her unexpected Massachusetts connection.

The post Margo Price talks AI, bro-country and meeting Joan Baez at the circus appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Margo Price will perform in Boston, showcasing her unique musical style on February 21.
Price discusses her inspirations, including a surprising connection to Massachusetts and Joan Baez.
Boston residents can engage with contemporary country music themes like AI and bro-country.
